Player History
Drafted in 27th round, 421st overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Injured on 5/4/2015 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Seattle on 7/10/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 8/9/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $952,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/20/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $1,755,000 per year...
Injured on 5/4/2017 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/17/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $950,000 per year...
